keywords: Chips & fries,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Zucchini,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Peanut free
name: Crispy Zucchini Parmesan Chips Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pinch salt (depending on your cheese, you may not need this)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 160Â°C. I like to use a dehydrator as my oven isn't great. Slice your Zucchini into coin shapes using a mandolin or fine slice with a knife
Melt about a tablespoon of garlic butter and coat the zucchini
Lay your Zucchini on trays and dehydrate over night on low or line your baking tray with paper and bake your zucchini chips for about an hour, flipping once throughout the process

Add any seasonings if using. I often use chilli powder and a tiny bit of this stock powder (if I'm not using garlic butter or cheese). Sprinkle half the grated cheese over your chips and bake for 7-8mins. Flip your chips and repeat the process They should be crispy and a light golden brown when you removed them from the oven
Once cooled, portion your chips and enjoy!
